messages.title: ONLY The Lib Dems will give the NHS the money it needs...
messages.content: Everybody knows that with an ageing population and the rising cost of treatment and medication, our health service needs more. Billions more. The Lib Dems have committed to investing an extra £8bn a year by 2020 - and they're the only party to have said how to find the extra cash Labour have ruled out finding the extra cash.

messages.title: It's a clear choice on the NHS
messages.content: The extra funding our NHS needs with the Lib Dems...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems are committed to investing an extra £8bn per year in the NHS by 2020.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour and Tories refuse to commit to doctors' £8bn NHS funding plea.

issues.health: The Lib Dems are committed to an £8bn per year investment in the NHS by 2020.

quotes.text: Only the Lib Dems have explicitly said they will increase funding by at least £8bn per year in real terms by 2020.
Labour and Tories refuse to commit to doctors' £8bn NHS funding plea.
